  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Description copied from class: GridBagCell
      This method is called when the master GridBagPanel's init method is called.

      Used to configure the cells depending on their real size once they are rendered.

      Override if a special configuration is needed only after rendering the Grid.

      Overrides:
      init in class GridBagCell
      See Also:
      • GridBagPanel.init()
